title: Textile, 20th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: warp-faced plain weave patterned by warp stripes and discontinuous supplementary weft floats
description: Two fragments machine stitched together. The wide piece is patterned by green stripes, five red and black stripes and a geometric patterned stripes in ivory, black and orange. The narrow piece is attached to the larger piece at one edge and is patterned by five red and black stripes.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 20th century.Medium: cotton
Technique: warp-faced plain weave patterned by warp stripes and discontinuous supplementary weft floats. 1969-146-1.
